description:
Kyosuke and Madoka end up shipwrecked, all alone on a deserted island, and Madoka has something she wants to ask Kyosuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Experience for Two! An Island of Forbidden Love
Esperienza per due! L`isola dell`amore proibito
Futari no Taiken! Kinjirareta Koi no Shima
二人の体験!禁じられた恋の島
